title: When was the cutoff date for the honor ward rewards?
body: I don't ever remember seeing a cutoff for the honor ward rewards, I was actually happy to having been reset on my honor a long time ago, seeing the honor 3 ward (the blue one) looking way cooler than the honor 4 or 5 wards. I was wondering since it takes a long time to get your honor back up and I just got back to honor 3 a couple days ago. Will I still get the ward?

replies.body:
Swiff Swish,

The honor wards are a part of the [end-of-season rewards](https://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2017-ranked-season-ends). If you finish the season, which ends tonight, silver or higher with honor level 3 or higher then you will receive your honor ward reward.
[Outlined last month](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068-2017-Ranked-Rewards-Eligibility), players with bans or chat restrictions active when the season ends are ineligible for this year’s rewards.
Players issued a ban of seven days or more from 8/22/2017 are ineligible for this year’s rewards. Bans that started before 8/22/2017 will not disqualify a player, even if the ban period extended past that date.
Players banned for boosting during the 2017 season remain ineligible for rewards.

Very Respectfully,
Desonance

Sorry to butt in Desonance, but this isn't quite 100% correct.

First off, you **DO NOT** need Silver in a queue to get the Honor Ward skin reward for being honorable. The Silver requirement is for the Victorious Ward Skin.

Second, being disqualified from ranked rewards **DOES NOT** disqualify you from Honor rewards. These are separate rewards being given out for achieving different things.

Hate to be 'that poro', just don't want mass confusion once rewards start rolling out xD!

YEEEEAAAAAAA SO THIS IS AWKWARD XD
